workflow.name: Crypto Price Monitor with Sentiment Alerts

messages.content: You are a cryptocurrency market analyst. Provide a brief sentiment summary based on recent market movements.

=Crypto prices have moved significantly: {{ $('Calculate Price Changes').first().json.significantChanges.map(c => `${c.coin}: ${c.change > 0 ? '+' : ''}${c.change.toFixed(2)}%`).join(', ') }}. Provide a brief 2-sentence sentiment summary about what this might indicate for the crypto market.

buildPhases.description: Initiates the workflow every 10 minutes to monitor cryptocurrency prices. This ensures regular price checking without manual intervention.
Fetches current cryptocurrency prices for SUI, ETH, and BTC from CoinGecko API. Also retrieves and stores historical price data in memory for comparison calculations.
Calculates percentage price changes over the last hour by comparing current prices with stored historical data. Identifies which cryptocurrencies have moved more than 3%.
Evaluates whether any cryptocurrency has experienced a significant price movement (>3%) that warrants sending an alert notification.
Generates an AI-powered sentiment summary of the market movements using OpenAI to provide context for the price changes.
Sends a formatted Telegram message containing the price movement details and sentiment analysis to alert the user of significant market changes.

buildPhases.description: Initiates the workflow every 10 minutes to monitor cryptocurrency prices. This ensures regular price checking without manual intervention.
Fetches current cryptocurrency prices for SUI, ETH, and BTC from CoinGecko API. Also retrieves and stores historical price data in memory for comparison calculations.
Calculates percentage price changes over the last hour by comparing current prices with stored historical data. Identifies which cryptocurrencies have moved more than 3%.
Evaluates whether any cryptocurrency has experienced a significant price movement (>3%) that warrants sending an alert notification.
Generates an AI-powered sentiment summary of the market movements using OpenAI to provide context for the price changes.
Sends a formatted Telegram message containing the price movement details and sentiment analysis to alert the user of significant market changes.

parameters.content:
## ðŸ“¥ Triggers
Initiates the workflow every 10 minutes to monitor cryptocurrency prices. This ensures regular price checking without manual intervention.

## ðŸ“Š Inputs
Fetches current cryptocurrency prices for SUI, ETH, and BTC from CoinGecko API. Also retrieves and stores historical price data in memory for comparison calculations.

## âš™ï¸ Transform
Calculates percentage price changes over the last hour by comparing current prices with stored historical data. Identifies which cryptocurrencies have moved more than 3%.

## ðŸ”€ Decision
Evaluates whether any cryptocurrency has experienced a significant price movement (>3%) that warrants sending an alert notification.

## ðŸ”— Integration
Generates an AI-powered sentiment summary of the market movements using OpenAI to provide context for the price changes.

## ðŸš€ Outputs
Sends a formatted Telegram message containing the price movement details and sentiment analysis to alert the user of significant market changes.
